thread.title: PUMA x Daily Paper Come Together for a Bold Collection Inspired by Maasai Cricketers
thread.title_full: PUMA x Daily Paper Come Together for a Bold Collection Inspired by Maasai Cricketers

author: Graeme Campbell
title: PUMA x Daily Paper Come Together for a Bold Collection Inspired by Maasai Cricketers
text:
Visit the original post to see all 4 images from this gallery. 
PUMA has joined forces with Amsterdam streetwear brand Daily Paper for a vibrant SS17 collection inspired by Maasai cricketers.
Spanning a variety of apparel and sneakers, the contemporary range goes in heavy on bold speckled graphics and bright, spring-ready colorways. Several PUMA staples have been reinvented with an East African, Maasai flavor including the Match crep which is featured in three styles. Elsewhere, the T7 Track Jacket — a key PUMA piece from the vault — has been revamped in red, black, mint and orange.
Shop Here / From $58 Cop via the first drop at the link above, and look out for the rest of the collection coming February 24.
In other PUMA news, the sportswear giant recently teamed up with Trapstar for a third consecutive season.
